EmailTemplate.description: To be sent to users in the Hard Bounce list
EmailTemplate.name: Bounce Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Why am I not receiving my Compliance Week e-newsletters?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We recently changed the service provider that we use to send our email newsletters. This has led to a high bounce rate from your company's servers. To guarantee you receive the newsletters you have selected, please contact your network administrator to add the following host addresses to your company's e-mail SPAM filter "whitelist":
Host Address
mail3539.haymarketmedia.mkt4136.com 74.121.48.24
mail3573.mkt4170.com 74.121.48.58
mail3575.mkt4172.com 74.121.48.60
mail3572.mkt4169.com 74.121.48.57
You will only receive e-mail newsletters from Compliance Week through those servers.
Best regards,
Compliance Week
